title: Keen:Moddig help!
content:
I can't log into Keen:modding; not only is my password 'incorrect' but the forum cannot send emails to my email account to tell me if my password has been changed.

WTF? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]


A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: hum
content: I'd guess that something with the hosting situation has changed.  I cannot log in, either, and my old bookmark (http://www.durdin.net/andy/keen/modding) no longer functions.  I now have to type in http://andy.durdin.net/keen/modding/ to get the page to come up.  This is different than before... so I think it'll have to wait until Andy can fix it.

title: Re: hum
content: Hmmm, can't log in either.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] Yeah, we can't do much more than wait..Eat your veggies!

title: Re: hum
content: Yes, i also found that the link to Keen:Modding forum in the main page of this forum doesn't work anymore. But could someone explain, what is happended again with that forum? Have Andrew Durdin changed something or it's bug?[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: heh
content:
You know, I just realized that you mis-spelled the title. Moddig? :-) Whoops.

The site, durdin.net, is actually run by Andy's family, not by Andy in particular. Maybe they changed something? Speculation is just words... I'll wait for Andy to pop up and explain.

title: Re: heh
content: Yah, it's technically his brother who's hosting all that cool Keen stuff. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: heh
content:
All hail Andy's brother!

Fatithful servant of our high lord Andy.



And I can get in nows! Yay!

title: Re: heh
content: Yah, works now! Good! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
